column5: Wayne took pic of the mouth of Wabigoon river coming into Clay Lake.This whole area will open up fast with the current and a bunch of current areas all the way in the river sure.
Everyone going for opener might have to fish the spot where the picture is,that'll be a crowd to remember.
Lol.it will definatly be open there.Ive spent a lot of years fishing there and pretty sure it will be open down stream to.Its all current for 25 mi.
looking at Manatoks webcam this morning it looks like some progress on that area as well!
Cool I've been looking for a webcam up that way....Their website is excellent. Love the overhead view of the camp with links to each cabin. Well done.
